original: de nyid ni gsang ba don yod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa brtan zhing mi phyed pa'i phyag rgya yin pas na /

analyzed: gsang ba'i don yod pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa ste /

analyzed: da ni padma'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

translated: Just as the Buddhas bestow upon the person the accomplishment of the person's aim by the method of embracing, so also bestow upon me the power of the accomplishment of the person's aim by the method of embracing.

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dgongs par mdzod cig ces bya ba ni bde ba stsol ba nyid dgongs shing mngon sum du mdzod cig pa'o //

analyzed: bdag la brtan par mdzod cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: Be firm in me means

analyzed: bdag la bde ba stsol ba mi phyed par mdzod cig ces pa'o //

analyzed: bdag la dgyes par mdzod cig ces bya ba'i mngon sum du phyogs shing grub par mdzod cig pa'o //

original: mchog nyid yin pas na bde mchog go //
analyzed: mchog nyid yin pas na bde mchog go //
translated: Supreme joy is supreme bliss.

original: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'dud pa'i tshig gis rang gi dbang bskur ba bdag la stsol cig ces ston pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'dud pa'i tshig gis rang gi dbang bskur ba bdag la stsol cig ces ston pa yin no //
translated: The word homage shows that one should request the consecration of oneself with the words of complete obeisance.

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi sems dpa'o //

translated: Vajrasattva is the indivisible bodhisattva because he is free from the concepts of subject and object.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni thar ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni thar ba'o //
translated: Great bliss is liberation.

original: kun du bzang po khyod ces bya ba ni khyed las kun du bzang por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩkhyed ni kun du bzang po ste //
analyzed: kun du bzang po khyod ces bya ba ni khyed las kun du bzang por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // khyed ni kun du bzang po ste //
translated: The meaning of you are Samantabhadra is that you will become Samantabhadra.

original: zhes bya ba ni kun du bzang po yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kun du bzang po yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: You are Samantabhadra means that you are Samantabhadra.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha mo rdo rje bsnyems ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha mo rdo rje bsnyems ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The Blessed One is Vajrasattva, and the goddess is the great seal of Vajragarbha.

analyzed: de'i bdag po yin pas na rdo rje bsnyems ma'i bdag po'o //
translated: Since he is the lord of that, he is the lord of Vajragarbha.

analyzed: de yang byang chub kyi sems chen po'i dbang gis rdo rje bsnyems ma rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bas de'i @20a * //
translated: Since the goddess Vajragarbha arises uninterruptedly through the power of great enlightenment spirit,

original: phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas rdo rje bsnyems ma'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas rdo rje bsnyems ma'i bdag po'o //
translated: he is the lord of Vajragarbha, since Vajrasattva is the nature of enlightenment spirit.

original: de yang sems ni bcom ldan 'das de 'dod chags chen po ni de'i lha mo'i zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang sems ni bcom ldan 'das de 'dod chags chen po ni de'i lha mo'i zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: And it is explained that mind is the Blessed One, and great passion is his goddess.

original: khams gsum gyi dbang phyug yin pa dang rigs thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas na khyab bdag go //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi dbang phyug yin pa dang rigs thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas na khyab bdag go //
translated: Since he is the lord of the three realms and the chief of all the clans, he is the all-pervading lord.

original: sems zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i khams rnams kyis bsags pas na sems so //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i khams rnams kyis bsags pas na sems so //
translated: The mind is the mind that is accumulated by the wholesome constituents.

original: de yang ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the Blessed One is all sentient beings?üîΩIt is said:

original: bsam mi khyab cing rgya cher zab //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab cing rgya cher zab //
translated: Inconceivable, vast, and profound,

original: mi 'gyur ba de ba kun grub pa //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba de ba kun grub pa //
translated: unwavering, all-accomplishing,

original: kun du khyab cing dri ma med //
analyzed: kun du khyab cing dri ma med //
translated: all-pervading, and stainless,

original: byang chub sems ni che zhing brtan //üîΩzhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems ni che zhing brtan // zhes gsungs pas /
translated: the awakened mind is great and firm.

original: sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems de nyid de /
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems de nyid de /
translated: Thus, the so-called bodhisattva is that very mind.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje dang gcig tu gyur par bsgoms pa'i mthus /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje dang gcig tu gyur par bsgoms pa'i mthus /
translated: By the power of meditating on the vajra of suchness becoming one,

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus pas na sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus pas na sems dpa' ste /
translated: since all conceptual thoughts are unable to disturb it, it is a bodhisattva.üîΩIt is said:

original: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //üîΩbrtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar bshad //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin // brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar bshad //
translated: The mind of all sentient beings

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is explained as a bodhisattva because it is firm.

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i sems rtse gcig po de nyid dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin las mnyam par 'jog pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bshad do //

translated: The so-called meditative stabilization is explained as meditative stabilization because it is the meditative equipoise from meditative stabilization, endowed with just that unwavering, one-pointed mind.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin can gyi sems te de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga ba'i gzugs su gyur pa ni rdo rje zhes bshad da /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin can gyi sems te de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga ba'i gzugs su gyur pa ni rdo rje zhes bshad da /
translated: The so-called vajra is the mind having the nature of meditative stabilization. That itself becomes the form of a five-pronged vajra on top of a moon disc through the process of the moon disc and so forth. That is explained as the vajra.

original: nges pa'i phyir na rdo rjer gyur //
analyzed: nges pa'i phyir na rdo rjer gyur //
translated: Because of the ascertainment, it becomes the vajra.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is explained in the Vajra≈õekhara Tantra:

original: de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rjer gyur pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs de nyid bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par gang gi che gyur pa de'i che rdo rje 'changüîΩba chen po yin te /

translated: The so-called vajra holder is the one who becomes the vajra holder, who holds the vajra and bell, the nature of the great seal of Vajrasattva, through the power of meditating on just that mind of Vajrasattva that becomes the vajra.

original: sems dpar byin rlabs sbyor ba yin //
analyzed: sems dpar byin rlabs sbyor ba yin //
translated: The consecration of the hero is the consecration of the mind.

original: slar yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur //
analyzed: slar yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur //

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

original: kun mchog ces bya ba la kun gyi mchog ni chos kyi dbyings te de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: kun mchog ces bya ba la kun gyi mchog ni chos kyi dbyings te de las byung ba'o //
translated: Supreme of all means the realm of phenomena, since it arises from that.

original: kun mchog dam tshig ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig ste phyag rgya 'di dam tshig ces bsgrags so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun mchog dam tshig ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig ste phyag rgya 'di dam tshig ces bsgrags so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Supreme commitment means the commitment of the nature of the great seal, etc. , since it is proclaimed that this seal is a commitment.

original: dngos @20b grub ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bor grub cing byung ba'o //
analyzed: dngos @20b grub ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bor grub cing byung ba'o //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
translated: Make me today a Vajrasattva.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin la de yang yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa' deng ste bdag de grub par gyur cig ces slob dpon la gsol ba 'debs pa'o ;
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin la de yang yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa' deng ste bdag de grub par gyur cig ces slob dpon la gsol ba 'debs pa'o ;
translated: Since one is a vajra being and also a sattva, one is a Vajrasattva. The master is entreated, ‚ÄúMay I be accomplished.‚Äù

original: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas slob dpon gyis dran na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dgyes par gyur la /
analyzed: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas slob dpon gyis dran na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dgyes par gyur la /
translated: Thus, having entered the mandala, the master, if he remembers, should delight the Bhagavat Vajrasattva.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba de dgyis pas slob dpon la nyid kyi yon tan bskyed pas byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba de dgyis pas slob dpon la nyid kyi yon tan bskyed pas byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do //

translated: Then, by that blessing, the master and the consort Vajragarvi, both of whom have entered into the experience of the bliss of self-awareness, experience and generate a bliss that has never been experienced before and has not occurred previously.

original: bde ba des kyang phra mo 'bab par gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rtogs shing thabs shes par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba des kyang phra mo 'bab par gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rtogs shing thabs shes par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And by that bliss, the bodhicitta descends and is realized, and the method is known.

original: de nas bdag la bcom ldan 'das grub par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bdag la bcom ldan 'das grub par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should understand that the Bhagavat has been accomplished in oneself.

original: bde ba phra mo 'bab cing skyed pa des bdag ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar grub par gyur te zhes de ltar shes shing nges par brtag par bya'o ;
analyzed: bde ba phra mo 'bab cing skyed pa des bdag ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar grub par gyur te zhes de ltar shes shing nges par brtag par bya'o ;

original: / de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod par ni bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: / de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod par ni bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: Then, sitting in the same way, one should recite the mantra as much as one wishes.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gang zhig bcings pa nyid dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gang zhig bcings pa nyid dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /

translated: The meaning of this is taught by ‚ÄúThen, sitting in the same way‚Äù and so on. Sitting in the same way as before, forming the same mudra as before, and sitting in the bodhisattva posture, one should recite the mantra immeasurably. This is called ‚Äúentering.‚Äù

original: rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi bsod nams dang rjes su mthun pa'i stobs kyis mkhas pa rnams yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub pa rnams 'thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi bsod nams dang rjes su mthun pa'i stobs kyis mkhas pa rnams yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub pa rnams 'thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the power of his own merit‚Äù means that by the power of his merit in accordance with his own, the wise ones will obtain the accomplishments that are desired in the mind.

analyzed: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni de nas bzung ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that time onward‚Äù means from that time on.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du sgrub par 'gyur zhing @21a * //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du sgrub par 'gyur zhing @21a * //
translated: One will accomplish Vajrasattva and so forth up to Vajravesa.

original: bzlas pa tsam gyis rang nyid dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam gyis rang nyid dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By mere recitation, one will be under one‚Äôs own control.

original: rang dbang nyid du gyur pa'i stobs nyid kyis de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang dbang nyid du gyur pa'i stobs nyid kyis de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By the power of being under one‚Äôs own control, one will see him.

original: de nas de mthong bas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad de la stsol bar mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas de mthong bas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad de la stsol bar mdzad do //

original: 'di'i rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bdag rang nyid kyis bcings nas las thams cad la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //

translated: The seal-impression of the sign of all these types is also done by oneself.üîΩAll pledges are the mandalas of all families, because they are firm and indivisible, since they grant one's own powers.

original: dam tshig thams cad ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams brtan par 'gyur zhing rang gi dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / las thams cad de rigs kyi las thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bsams pa tsam gyis byed pa dang /
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams brtan par 'gyur zhing rang gi dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / las thams cad de rigs kyi las thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bsams pa tsam gyis byed pa dang /
translated: All activities are the activities of all families, because they are performed merely by imagining the mandala.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i las kyang byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i las kyang byed pa'o //
translated: The activities of the great seal and so forth are also performed.

analyzed: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: All joys and mental satisfactions are easy to understand.üîΩThen, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas kyi sgra ni phyogs gzhan ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas kyi sgra ni phyogs gzhan ston par byed pa yin te /

analyzed: de nas bshad ma thag pa'i cho gas bdag nyid kyi don du dkyil 'khor brtag par bya ba ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i don du dkyil 'khor bris la de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas te rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas /
translated: Then, although it is not necessary to draw the mandala for one‚Äôs own aim by the rite just explained, nevertheless, in order to introduce all sentient beings, one should draw the mandala, and then, having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva, one should adorn oneself with the ornaments of Vajrasattva,üîΩand having bound the pledge seal of the Vajra of Great Bliss explained below,

original: rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'og nas bshad pa bcings la de nas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la sngar bshad pa'i glu len cing 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'og nas bshad pa bcings la de nas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la sngar bshad pa'i glu len cing 'jug par bya'o //
translated: one should take up the flower garland and enter, singing the song explained above.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du dran par bya'o //
translated: Then, as before, one should recall the pledge seal of one‚Äôs own deity.

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad do //
translated: Then, having sealed with the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal pledges, one should perform all the rites.

original: rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gi / phyag rgya bcings nas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs la /
analyzed: rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gi / phyag rgya bcings nas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs la /
translated: Having bound the pledge seal of the Vajra of Complete Joy, one should remain as before.

original: dran par bya sa nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: dran par bya sa nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: Having recalled, one should say this:

analyzed: srid pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'byung bas na srid pa ste //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúbliss of existence‚Äù and so on. Existence is that from which one arises.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is non-abiding nirvana.

original: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni srid pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni srid pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: The bliss that arises from that is the bliss of existence.

original: de'i rnam @21b par dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rnam @21b par dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: Its purity is the absence of conceptualization.

original: de'i don ni sngar byung ba'i gnas te so so skye bo'i gnas skabs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: de'i don ni sngar byung ba'i gnas te so so skye bo'i gnas skabs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: Its meaning is the abode of the past, the abode of the stage of an ordinary being, the celestial mansion of the Blessed Vajrasattva.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'dis rang bzhin gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur pas na gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'dis rang bzhin gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur pas na gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: This non-abiding nirvana is the immeasurable mansion, since it is the non-abiding nirvana by nature.

original: dga' ba ni chags par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni chags par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Delight is the state of being attached.

original: 'dod pa thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
translated: All desires are Vajrasattva and so on.

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni gdul bya'i rgyud la de bskyed par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni gdul bya'i rgyud la de bskyed par gyur pa'o //
translated: Their success is the generation of that in the continuum of the disciple.

original: de'i don gyi dngos grub ni 'gro ba thams cad la yang bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: de'i don gyi dngos grub ni 'gro ba thams cad la yang bskyed pa ste /
translated: The success of that is the generation of that in all migrating beings.

original: sems can thams cad grub par byas pa'o zhes bdag kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad grub par byas pa'o zhes bdag kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
translated: The word also indicates that all sentient beings are made successful.

original: de ltar slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir rjes su gnang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams me tog la sogs pa yang dag par mchod de slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir rjes su gnang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams me tog la sogs pa yang dag par mchod de slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Thus, having taken the permission for the sake of inducting the disciple, having made proper offerings to the mandala deities with flowers and so on, one should induct the disciple.

original: de yang rang gi lha gzhug pa'i cho gas rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis gzhug go //
analyzed: de yang rang gi lha gzhug pa'i cho gas rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis gzhug go //
translated: Moreover, one should enter into the mandala of one's deity by means of the seals of entering into one's deity.

original: de ltar rang gi lha'i 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug pa'i rjes thogs nyid la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi lha'i 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug pa'i rjes thogs nyid la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, immediately after entering by means of the rite of entering into one's deity, one should utter the following:üîΩThe world of those to be disciplined by freedom from passion, etc.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Freedom from passion refers to the nirvana of the sravakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'dis 'dul bas na 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis 'dul bas na 'dul ba ste /
translated: Discipline means that which disciplines.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jug pa zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jug pa zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: It shows that one enters into the nirvana of the sravakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten no //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten no //
translated: That which is to be disciplined by freedom from passion is the world to be disciplined by freedom from passion.

original: sems can gyi khams 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de ni ji skad du bshad pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i chags pa dang bral bas
analyzed: sems can gyi khams 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de ni ji skad du bshad pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i chags pa dang bral bas
translated: The world of beings is called pure because of being free from attachment.

original: yang dag par 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That world which is to be disciplined by means of freedom from attachment becomes free from the stain of cyclic existence, as explained above, by means of the freedom from attachment to the nirvana of the sravakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin //
translated: Vajrasattva is to be concealed.

original: zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsang zhing sba bar bya ba yin gyi bstan par ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsang zhing sba bar bya ba yin gyi bstan par ni mi bya'o //
translated: Vajrasattva, the Bhagavat, is to be concealed and not revealed to the world which is to be disciplined by means of freedom from attachment.

original: ni'i sgra ni rgyu'i don te gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas @22a * //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni rgyu'i don te gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas @22a * //
translated: The word ni has the sense of cause, because of freedom from attachment.

original: 'dul zhing mos pa dman pa dang ldan pa rnams la chos bdag med pa'i 'dod chags rdo rje 'chang chen po'i chags pa chen po shin tu zab mo thos nas spong bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'dul zhing mos pa dman pa dang ldan pa rnams la chos bdag med pa'i 'dod chags rdo rje 'chang chen po'i chags pa chen po shin tu zab mo thos nas spong bar 'gyur la /
translated: Those who are to be disciplined, who have inferior aspirations, will reject the extremely profound great passion of Great Passion Vajradhara, who is the realitylessness of things, when they hear about it.

original: de spangs pas dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de spangs pas dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And by rejecting it, they will fall into the great hell of Avici.

original: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, Vajrasattva is hidden.

original: 'dod chags chen po ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is great passion?

original: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i bde ba chen po'i thar pa chen po'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i bde ba chen po'i thar pa chen po'o //
translated: It is the great bliss of the great liberation of great compassion, which is the power of non-apprehension, and which ripens all sentient beings.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan dag ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan dag ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no other suffering which is similar to or equal with the passionlessness which has been explained.

analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems shin tu 'gags pas bde ba thams cad med pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis bde ba thams cad med pa yin la /
translated: Because of the complete cessation of body, speech, and mind, all bliss is absent, and so there is no natural absence of all bliss.

analyzed: de bas na 'dod chags dang bral zhing bral bar ma byed cig ces pa'o //
translated: Therefore, do not become free from attachment, do not become free!

original: yang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba lta bu'i sdug bsngal gzhan dag med pa de bas na 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa'i gnas su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba lta bu'i sdug bsngal gzhan dag med pa de bas na 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa'i gnas su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed
translated: Again, since there is no other suffering like freedom from attachment, therefore, do not attain nirvana in the state of attaining the enlightenment of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas, which is free from all attachment.

original: cig ces bzlog pa'o //

analyzed: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston te rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi cho ga rjes su spyan nas /
translated: This teaches the following meaning: Having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva just as it is, up to the rite of the spiritual powers and the vajra conduct,

original: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis mchod la bdag nyid dang chos dang las dang / dam tshig gzung nas phyag rgya bzhi byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis mchod la bdag nyid dang chos dang las dang / dam tshig gzung nas phyag rgya bzhi byas la /
translated: worship with the four secret offerings of Vajra Weapon and so on, and take up the self, dharma, action, and pledge seals.

original: rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes phyag byas te /
analyzed: rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes phyag byas te /
translated: Having bowed to the Vajra of the Joy of Play,

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: having formed the mudra of supreme enlightenment and having contemplated oneself as Vairocana, one should recite the mantra of the reality of the Great Pledge one hundred thousand times.

original: de nas ras ris 'drir bcug ste ras ris la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spyan drangs la rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ras ris 'drir bcug ste ras ris la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spyan drangs la rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, having had a painting made, one should invite the Blessed One Vairocana into the painting and accomplish him with the pledge mudra of Vajrasattva.

original: de nas chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab bo //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab bo //
translated: Then one should seal him with the Dharma mudra.

original: de nas dam tshig chen @45b po'i de kho na nyid zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag bzhi byas la /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig chen @45b po'i de kho na nyid zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag bzhi byas la /
translated: Having made offerings, do four prostrations.

original: rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes kyang phyag byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de nas nang par de bzhin du 'gyur par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes kyang phyag byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de nas nang par de bzhin du 'gyur par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having made prostrations with the joy of Vajra Playfulness, form the supreme enlightenment seal and do one hundred thousand recitations. Then, in the morning, the deity will come.

original: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gal te rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgrub par 'dod na ;
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gal te rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgrub par 'dod na ;
translated: Then, as for great Vajradhara and so forth, if the practitioner wishes to accomplish great Vajradhara,

original: rnal 'byor pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sku lugs ma'am brkos pa byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sku lugs ma'am brkos pa byed du gzhug go //
translated: That yogin should have a bronze or carved image of Bhagavat Vajrasattva made.

original: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What kind?

original: dkyil 'khor bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Like the mandala, he says.

original: ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su de'i mtshan nyid bshad pa bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su de'i mtshan nyid bshad pa bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: just as the characteristics of that [image] are explained in the context of the mandala.

original: de lta bur byas nas de'i mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: de lta bur byas nas de'i mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: Having made it like that, in front of it one should perform the self-consecration and so forth.

original: der bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs te mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje la bzlas pa bya ba'i snying po yid kyis bris la phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: der bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs te mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje la bzlas pa bya ba'i snying po yid kyis bris la phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Having invited Bhagavat there just as [described], one should make perfect offerings with all offerings, and having written the essence of the recitation mentally on the vajra located in the heart of the Bhagavat, one should form the great seal.

original: nyin re zhing ji skad du bshad pa'i tshig gi sngags zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: nyin re zhing ji skad du bshad pa'i tshig gi sngags zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting the mantra of the explained words daily, one should meditate.

original: mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Finally, on the night of the full moon, one should meditate throughout the night.

original: de lta bus ni zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one becomes like Great Vajradhara in six months.

original: de ltar dang por sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dang por sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, first, in the practice, one should make the special image.

original: ji ltar rdo rje 'chang ba sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par 'dir bshad pa ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje 'chang ba sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par 'dir bshad pa ltar /
translated: Just as this special image is explained in the practice of Vajradhara,

original: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: one should understand it in the same way in the practice of Vajrasattva explained above.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' thob pa ji ltar bsgrub pa gsungs pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' thob pa ji ltar bsgrub pa gsungs pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Just as it is said that one should practice in order to attain Vajrasattva,

original: ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i sgrub pa la rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs su byas nas sgrub par gsungs pa ji ltar thob pa de bzhin du 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i sgrub pa la rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs su byas nas sgrub par gsungs pa ji ltar thob pa de bzhin du 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
translated: one should understand it in the same way here, just as it is said that one should practice in the attire of Vajrasattva in the practice explained above.

original: zla ba drug gis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub 'grub bo zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i sku gzugs kyi sgrub bas zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'dzin @46a * //
analyzed: zla ba drug gis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub 'grub bo zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i sku gzugs kyi sgrub bas zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'dzin @46a * //
translated: One will achieve the feat of Great Vajradhara in six months means that by the practice of the deity explained just above, one will achieve the feat of Great Vajradhara in six months.üîΩ

original: pa chen po'i dngos grub chen po rnal 'byor pas 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩde nas rdo rje 'chang chen po bkug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gal te sgrub pa po rdo rje 'chang chen po 'gugs par byed par 'dod na /
analyzed: pa chen po'i dngos grub chen po rnal 'byor pas 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po bkug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gal te sgrub pa po rdo rje 'chang chen po 'gugs par byed par 'dod na /
translated: One attains the power of Great Vajradhara in six months means that the yogin attains the great power of Great Vajradhara in six months by the practice of the image just explained.üîΩThis is the meaning of the statement.

original: ji srid mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
translated: Then, if the practitioner wishes to summon Great Vajradhara, he should perform the preliminary service until he obtains the signs,

original: de nas ras ris 'drir gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas ras ris 'drir gzhug go //
translated: and then he should have the painting made.

original: de nas de'i mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
analyzed: de nas de'i mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
translated: Then, in front of it, he should perform the self-consecration and so forth.

original: ras ris la sngar bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang / gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgyas dgug pa dang ; gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas la dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsgrubs la /
analyzed: ras ris la sngar bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang / gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgyas dgug pa dang ; gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas la dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsgrubs la /
translated: With the mantra for inviting the Bhagavat as previously explained, and with the seal of the secret hook, summon, induct, bind, and control the painting.
